title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 684.4 - Operating revenues, segregation of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 684.4 - Operating revenues, segregation of

State Regulations

Utilities generating significant amounts of revenue
through offering multiple services may, at their option, segregate revenues by
the various types of one-way and two-way services such as tone only, tone and
voice, hand portable, radio-telephone utility and vehicle-mounted
radio-telephone utility services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
684.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
